text:
Technical Co-Founder (Ruby On Rails) Makrs | BC, Canada | REMOTE | Minimum 20 hours a week

I am the CEO and Founder of Makrs. An tech startup based in BC, Canada. We are a social collaboration and inspiration network for Makers and DIY enthusiasts.

We are looking to bring on a full-stack ruby on rails developer to help us launch. Students are welcome.

you can apply at kyle@makrs.io
